thoughts.text: I think it would be a good idea to explore the 'list_files' command to see what files are currently in the workspace. This will help me keep track of what I have saved and what I need to save. I should also think about organizing my files into folders to make it easier to find what I need.
thoughts.reasoning: I need to keep track of my files and organize them to be more efficient.
thoughts.plan:
- Use 'list_files' command to see what files are in the workspace
- Organize files into folders
thoughts.criticism: I need to be more organized and keep track of my files better.
thoughts.speak: I think it would be helpful to use the 'list_files' command to see what files are in the workspace and organize them into folders to make it easier to find what I need.
